class_notes: Non-BIOS Students must get permission of Instructor or BIOS ADAP required.
course_description: Prerequisites: BIOS 512 or permission of instructor. Introduces the theory of parameter estimation, interval estimation, and tests of hypotheses. In this course, we emphasize the classical "frequentist" (i.e., Neyman-Pearson-Wald) approach to inference. As time permits, we briefly explore alternative paradigms of inference such as neo-Fisherian, Bayesian, and statistical decision theory.
schedule_location: MW 1pm-2:50pm in R. Randall Rollins Bldg. R226
